```{r get rev cov hubs as a fn of dim, include=FALSE}
library(pbapply)
hub_nb_dim<- function(data,d,k,hub_scores, percent) {
  neighbors <- findKNN(t(data[1:d,]), k)
  neighbor_list <- neighbors$index
  rownames(neighbor_list) <- colnames(data)
  h_nb <- reverse_coverage_percent_k(neighbor_list, hub_scores, k, cell_nb, percent)
  return(h_nb)
}
```
